verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:10
verses.text: But by the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:11
verses.text: Therefore whether it were I or they, so we preach, and so ye believed.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:12
verses.text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead, how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 15:13
verses.text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead, then is Christ not risen:
